title: Skip Ghosted, watch these 6 spy comedies instead
description: Apple TV Plus' new spy comedy isn't a big hit, but there are plenty of other great options if you know where to look. Here are some of our favorites.

title: Europe wants more cities to use data center waste heating
description: EU wants to reuse energy from data centers for carbon-neutral heating, with Germany proposing stringent targets to get there.

title: iOS 17 app sideloading might only be available in Europe
description: According to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, iOS 17 is going to allow sideloading – but only if you're in Europe.

title: Leaked Google Pixel Fold video shows the fold in action for the first time
description: Google's foldable should be officially unveiled in the near future, but we've got an early look at it.

title: Watch out - that dream job offer could be a malware scam
description: North Korean Lazarus hackers target Linux users with job-themed malware.

title: DJI Mavic 3 Pro: everything we know so far  and 5 things we want to see
description: A wave of DJI Mavic 3 Pro leaks suggest that the triple-camera drone is preparing for take-off. Here's everything you need to know.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, April 22 (game #453)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
